titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing special awards to World War I and World War II veterans of the United States Navy Armed Guard.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 9/28/2005--Introduced. Authorizes and urges the President to award the John Eopolucci United States Navy Armed Guard Service Medal to recognize service of members of the United States Navy Armed Guard during World War I or II as service in a special force or in a military organization of the Navy.
